DataSource.query:
select
distinct
*
from
(
SELECT
distinct
'P_NA',
'P_'||nvl(pvs_6,'NA')
FROM
dtl_vr_auszahlungen
WHERE
stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'P_NA',
'P_'||nvl(pvs_6,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_entscheidungsvorlagen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)
and bearb_dat >= to_date('01.04.2011','DD.MM.YYYY')

union all

select distinct
'P_NA',
'P_'||nvl(pvs_6,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_neue_vertraege
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'P_NA',
'P_'||nvl(pvs_6,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_bestandszusagen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'P_NA',
'P_'||nvl(pvs_6,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_revo_auszahlungen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)
)
